## My favourite museums in the Netherlands
```{r}
date()
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
```

```{r }
mymap <- leaflet() %>%
        addTiles() %>%
        addMarkers(lat = 52.3599976, lng = 4.8852188, popup = "Rijksmuseum") %>%
        addMarkers(lat = 52.0804205, lng = 4.3143013, popup = "Mauritshuis") %>%
        addMarkers(lat = 51.9142145, lng = 4.4733407, popup = "Museum Boymans van Beuningen") %>%
        addMarkers(lat = 52.3584159, lng = 4.8810756, popup = "Van Gogh museum") %>%
        addMarkers(lat = 52.1648206, lng = 4.4751528, popup = "Naturalis") %>%
        addMarkers(lat = 52.0099492, lng = 5.9066406, popup = "Openlucht museum") %>%
        addMarkers(lat = 52.1149276, lng = 4.6504624, popup = "Archeon")
mymap
```
